Topic.Title: How to make an DnD sytem in Squiffy

Posts.EditableText: I'm seeing some RPGs that uses Squiffy, or maybe some other function, but I can tell from just the structure. If anyone has insight, let me know.

Posts.EditableText: Well, they are using squiffy for the overall pathing (even if there is random deterministic stuff going on). But a lot of that requires Java Scripting to get such things as randomness and combat systems. Squiffy makes a good framework but dosn't quite have the horsepower to get it out of the trickledown gamebook pathing - it needs the boost of Java.
